review: For me at least I have grown to love mine over the last year and I couldn't go without having it. My house currently has one connected to every TV and we have now even cut the cord with Time  Warner Cable! Now I'm also saving money because of the entertainment these supply! The only things I wish Chromecast had and I'm hoping for in the next generation is the ability to watch Amazon Prime content and use 5ghz WiFi.All in all this was a great buy and Ive definitely put this product through its tests and it was worth every penny!
